channel.title: BM HD requierements matched?
channel.description:
Hi guys!
my old PC which had bad performances crashed and i would like to ask if i will be able to play HD BM with following performances.
By HD BM i mean playing BM at res 1024x768 or 1280x1024 and everything else on very high. most important is 6xMSAA.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Win XP AMD Athlon II X2 250 3GHz 1x2GB DDR2 800MHz nVidia GeForce GT220 1GB
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Win XP Intel Pentium Dual-Core E6500 2.93GHz 1x2GB DDR2 800MHz ATI Radeon 4650HD 1GB
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
which would be better and will i be able to play HD BM at any of this?
Thanks!

item.title: BM HD requierements matched?
item.dc:creator: DarkDragon
item.description:
k, thanks a lot guys

all best!

Read full topic

item.title: BM HD requierements matched?
item.dc:creator: Ond_kaja
item.description:
King_Kaddo:

There is no 6xMSAA. If there were it wouldn’t work.

There is 6xMSAA and some cards actually supports it.

Read full topic

item.title: BM HD requierements matched?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
If you get shitty FPS just overclock your CPU and/or GPU.

item.title: BM HD requierements matched?

item.description:
Both should be able to handle it at very high settings perfectly fine.

There is no 6xMSAA. If there were it wouldn’t work.

item.title: BM HD requierements matched?

item.description:
Hi guys!

my old PC which had bad performances crashed and i would like to ask if i will be able to play HD BM with following performances.

By HD BM i mean playing BM at res 1024x768 or 1280x1024 and everything else on very high. most important is 6xMSAA.

Win XP
AMD Athlon II X2 250 3GHz
1x2GB DDR2 800MHz
nVidia GeForce GT220 1GB

Win XP
Intel Pentium Dual-Core E6500 2.93GHz
1x2GB DDR2 800MHz
ATI Radeon 4650HD 1GB

which would be better and will i be able to play HD BM at any of this?
